author: wrowe
msg: There are considerably fewer ces modules (and they are quite
a bit more sophisticated).  Always build these first before
trawling through the entire list of ccs modules, since any
problem will occur up front and be fixable more quickly.

author: wrowe
msg: Use $(OutDir) and $(IntDir) rather than explicit paths to simplify

author: wrowe
msg: In order to provide an easier VStudio .vcproj file transition
replace most path occurances with $(IntDir)/$(OutDir) substitutions.
Use the Debug|ReleaseNT (renamed) Lib[RD]NT directories when building
an NT-specific target; note that other than the origin of the link to
[lib]apr-1.lib, there's no other difference between these targets.
This simply allows us to link against NT-specific builds.
Note an NT-linked libapriconv or it's iconv .so code pages will load
just as easily against the non-NT libapr.dll, there's no difference

author: wrowe
msg: In order to provide an easier VStudio .vcproj file transition
